page.title: 06Travellers at Aust Services
page.content: We visited Aust Services on Tuesday 18 June 1985.We stayed there from 10.00a.m. until 12.15p.m. In this time the car parks rapidly filled. There were a number of coaches which had come from many different areas of the United Kingdom. Some were on day trips to Wales,others were taking passengers on touring holidays. One senior citizen said she was on a day's outing with her club to Barry. Another lady we spoke to said she lived in South Wales was travelling to Ascot for a stay of a few days and would be sleeping with her family in their van. There were also a number of transport lorries. They had come from many places including Southern Ireland,Wales and Denmark
